descript.abstract: This dataset was developed using reported water use collected through the Illinois Water Inventory Program (IWIP) and depicts the network of water purchases between communities and public water distributors throughout Illinois for the year 2012 for 778 public water entities. Entities include municipalities (towns, cities, villages, census-designated places) and public water distributors (water districts, water commissions, water cooperatives, water companies, etc.). Lines represent a transaction of water between public water entities and in no way represent actual water mains or pipelines. Attributes include the amount of purchased water reported for the year 2012 in gallons or in million gallons per day (mgd). Not all communities reported for the year 2012. Therefore some transactions are not represented with this dataset, or do not have reported purchased water values listed in the attribute table.Point locations listed for municipal buyers and sellers represent the centroid of the municipal boundary. Point locations for non-municipalities (public water distributors) represent either the centroid of the district’s pipeline network, treatment facilities, or other relevant infrastructure. Point locations are in Clarke_1866_Lambert_Conformal_Conic projection. Fields:FAC_ID = Illinois Facility Identification numberFAC_TYPE = Facility Type (CDP= Census Designated Place)SOURCE = Facilities classified as “groundwater”, “surface water” or “mixed”SOURCE_2 = Same as SOURCE, but Lake Michigan users are separated from the “surface water” classSW_TYPE = Surface water typeSW_ORIGIN = Name of specific surface water bodyGW_TYPE = Groundwater TypeGW_ORIGIN = Name of specific aquiferBUYS_FROM = Name of facility that community purchases water fromBuy_Flag = Flag to indicate a water purchase by an entitySELLER_FAC_ID = Illinois Facility Identification number of the sellerSS_2012_GALLONS = amount of water in gallons self-supplied by facility reported for 2012P_2012_GALLONS = amount of water in gallons purchased by facility reported for 2012TOTAL_2012_GALLONS = total amount of water in gallons used by facility reported 2012SS_2012_MGD = amount of water in millions of gallons per day (mgd) self-supplied by facility reported for 2012P_2012_MGD = amount of water in millions of gallons per day (mgd) purchased by facility reported for 2012
descript.purpose: This dataset depicts the network of water purchases between communities and public water distributors throughout Illinois for the year 2012 for 778 public water entities. Entities include municipalities (towns, cities, villages, census-designated places) and public water distributors (water districts, water commissions, water companies, etc.). Lines represent a transaction of water between public water entities and in no way represent actual water mains or pipelines. Attributes include the amount of purchased water reported for the year 2012 in gallons or in million gallons per day (mgd). Not all communities reported for the year 2012.

idinfo.useconst: Map information is to be used at a scientifically and cartographically appropriate scale, that is, at a scale no greater than indicated on the map or as described in the documentation of the map or map data. Map information is not appropriate for, and is not to be used as, a geodetic, legal, or engineering base. Map information has no legal basis in the definition of boundaries or property lines and is not intended as a substitute for surveyed locations such as can be determined by a registered Public Land Surveyor. The data do not replace the need for detailed site-specific studies.
idinfo.datacred: Hadley, Daniel.R., Krueger, Joanna A., and Roadcap, George S. Illinois State Water Survey (Groundwater Science Section)
idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows 7 Version 6.1 (Build 7601) Service Pack 1; Esri ArcGIS 10.3.1.4959

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Length of feature in internal units.

attrdomv.udom: Positive real numbers that are automatically generated.
